ctx: apply mon_t with (R:=R) (S:=S) in HF; auto.
apply mon_t with (R:=(F R)) (S:=(F S)) in HG.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: apply mon_t with (R:=R) (S:=S) in HF; auto.
apply mon_t with (R:=(F R)) (S:=(F S)) in HG.
apply mon_a with (R:=R) (S:=S) in HF; auto.
apply mon_a with (R:=(F R)) (S:=(F S)) in HG.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y F, G : function X Y R, S : relation2 X Y HF : evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) HG : monotonic TX TY G E : evolve TX TY R S H_incl : incl R S Unable to unify "evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)" with "evolve TX TY (F R) (F S)".

original: apply mkmon. - apply mon_m in HF. apply mon_m in HG. unfold increasing in *. intros. apply (HG (F R)). apply HF. auto. - intros R S E H_incl. apply mon_t with (R:=R) (S:=S) in HF; auto. apply mon_t with (R:=(F R)) (S:=(F S)) in HG. auto. apply HF. auto. - intros R S E H_incl. apply mon_a with (R:=R) (S:=S) in HF; auto. apply mon_a with (R:=(F R)) (S:=(F S)) in HG. auto. apply HF. auto.
